channel.title: Introduction: Gene Bellinger
channel.description:
I'm a recovering Systems Thinker who now works with people and groups to develop stories about situations enabling them to better understand and deal with situations.
The following are links to some of my many works in progress!
> Systems Thinker Postscript: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WKzdd63CdN0 > The Essence of And?: https://bra.in/8jga2p > YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/systemswiki > Kumu Template: https://kumu.io/-/104856 > Insight Maker Template: https://insightmaker.com/insight/178171
